item.title: @elonmusk: We now have the confirmed and finalized homicide rate for El Salvador in 2025. 1.19. 38% and about 7...
item.description: We now have the confirmed and finalized homicide rate for El Salvador in 2025. 1.19. 38% and about 75% lower than the rates in Canada and the U.S., respectively, in 2024. This even beats some European countries, like France. This is staggering.

item.title: @elonmusk: Protesters who are paid should be required to disclose that they are being paid and by whom. Protest...
item.description: Protesters who are paid should be required to disclose that they are being paid and by whom. Protests are political speech/advertising. Why are they exempt from the same disclosures required for political advertising?

item.title: @elonmusk: üö® BOOM! President Trump posts Scott Presler blowing the whistle on potential MAJOR VOTER FRAUD in Mi...
item.description: üö® BOOM! President Trump posts Scott Presler blowing the whistle on potential MAJOR VOTER FRAUD in Minnesota by letting ONE person "vouch" for EIGHT migrant voters who have not been verified "Did you know that in 2008, 500,000 voters, or nearly 19% of all voters in Minnesota, registered on election day?!" "And did you know that former Senator Al Franken was elected by 312 votes?" "What I am saying is that this vouching system, which clearly opens the door for potential fraud, could swing statewide elections!"@ScottPreslerThis law must be overturned.

item.title: @elonmusk: Prompt Share: Highly detailed fantasy portrait of a beautiful ethereal woman with pale skin, bold re...
item.description: Prompt Share: Highly detailed fantasy portrait of a beautiful ethereal woman with pale skin, bold red lips, intense gaze, long voluminous curly dark brown hair flowing wildly, wearing an elaborate ornate golden headdress crown with intricate filigree and spikes, dangling gold earrings, choker necklace, and a deep black off shoulder gown with lavish gold embroidery and baroque patterns, deep plunging neckline, surrounded by swirling dramatic smoke and clouds in muted beige and blue tones, intricate textures, baroque fantasy art style, dramatic lighting, masterpiece, ultra detailed, cinematic.
